question:
In context with the irrigation policy in India, which of the following is / are correct statements?
  1. A minor irrigation scheme has Cultural Command Area (CCA) up to 2000 Hectares
  2. Tubewells come within the score of minor irrigation scheme
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: A minor irrigation scheme has Cultural Command Area (CCA) up to 2000 Hectares. A medium Irrigation scheme has CCA from 2000 Hectares to 10000 Hectares. A major irrigation scheme has a CCA above 10,000 hectares.
